thread.title: Mike Cooke
thread.title_full: Zopa Ltd reviewed by Mike Cooke

author: Mike Cooke
title: Mike Cooke
text:
Just finished repaying my loan - I had some concerns re this method of borrowing but I needn't have worried. The application process was straightforward and rate Quote: d was v competitive via the website.
Repayments are by direct debit with options to make additional payments. Website shows up to date repayments and next monthly repayment plus annual statements and options to change date/repay early/repay an additional amount.
I managed the whole account via their website from my phone.
I would definitely use again.
Thanks Zopa
